title: Plat 4 Jg main LF solo queue duo
body:
68% wr in plat 4 this preseason, hecarim main can play karth/kayn/yi also
Be tilt proof and be consistently not shit plz and I'll do the same
Everyone has bad games goes for me to but im lf for someone who wont tilt or rq after a shitty game/play
Lf midlaner pref cause im aggressive af but any role is fine
